title: Warm Clothes for Dhaka City
description: A campaign to collect warm winter clothes for the underprivileged in Dhaka city. The goal is to provide jackets, sweaters, and blankets to homeless individuals and families.

title: Dhaka Winter Clothing Drive
description: A drive to collect winter clothing such as jackets, scarves, and gloves for low-income families across Dhaka city, ensuring no one is left out in the cold.

title: Chittagong Winter Clothing Drive
description: This drive aims to help the rural and coastal areas of Chittagong by providing winter clothes to those who cannot afford them, especially during the harsh cold months.

title: Chittagong Coastal Winter Relief
description: A campaign to support coastal communities in Chittagong Division who struggle with the cold weather by providing essential winter clothing.

title: Rajshahi Winter Relief Fund
description: A winter relief campaign focused on providing winter jackets, shawls, and other warm clothing to the people of Rajshahi, particularly in rural areas.

title: Rajshahi Rural Winter Clothing Collection
description: A campaign to collect winter clothing for rural areas of Rajshahi, focusing on jackets, sweaters, and thermal wear for those in need.

title: Sylhet Warmth Donation Initiative
description: An initiative to provide warm clothing to underprivileged families in Sylhet Division. The campaign focuses on delivering thermal wear, blankets, and winter accessories.

title: Sylhet Winter Clothing Donation
description: Collecting winter clothing to help families in Sylhet Division stay warm during the winter months. The goal is to distribute jackets, woolen socks, and blankets.

title: Khulna Clothing Donation Campaign
description: This campaign is designed to collect and distribute winter clothing such as sweaters, jackets, and woolen socks to needy people in Khulna, particularly those in rural areas.

title: Barisal Winter Coat Distribution
description: A seasonal campaign to gather and distribute winter coats, gloves, and scarves to vulnerable communities in Barisal Division, helping people cope with the cold.
